trans-unit.source: Defines a collection that stores <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Задает коллекцию, которая хранит объекты <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Инициализирует новый экземпляр класса <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Инициализирует новый экземпляр класса <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The array of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> objects with which to initialize the new object.
trans-unit.target: Массив объектов <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />, которыми следует инициализировать новый объект.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> class from an array of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Инициализирует новый экземпляр класса <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> из массива объектов <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> with which to initialize the new object.
trans-unit.target: Объект <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> для инициализации нового объекта.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> class from another <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Инициализирует новый экземпляр класса <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> из другого <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> to add to the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Сертификат <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />, добавляемый в текущую коллекцию <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> with the specified value to the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Добавляет <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> с указанным значением в текущую коллекцию <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The index into the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> at which the new <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> was inserted.
trans-unit.target: Индекс в текущей коллекции <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />, по которому был вставлен новый сертификат <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of an array of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> into the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Копирует элементы массива с типом <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> в текущую коллекцию <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The array of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> containing the objects to add to the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Массив с типом <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />, содержащий объекты для добавления в текущую коллекцию <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of an array of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> to the end of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Копирует элементы массива с типом <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> в конец текущей коллекции <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Параметр <paramref name="value" /> имеет значение <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> containing the objects to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Коллекция <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />, содержащая объекты для добавления в коллекцию.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> to the end of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Копирует элементы указанной коллекции <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> в конец текущей коллекции <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Параметр <paramref name="value" /> имеет значение <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> to locate.
trans-unit.target: Искомый объект <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />.
trans-unit.target: Получает значение, указывающее, содержит ли текущая коллекция <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> указанный сертификат <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> is contained in this collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Значение <see langword="true" />, если сертификат <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> содержится в этой коллекции; в противном случае — значение <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that is the destination of the values copied from <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Одномерный массив <see cref="T:System.Array" />, который является целевым для значений, копируемых из <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The index into <c>array</c> to begin copying.
trans-unit.target: Индекс в <c>array</c>, с которого начинается копирование.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> values in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> to a one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> instance at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Копирует значения <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> из текущей коллекции <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> в экземпляр одномерного массива <see cref="T:System.Array" /> по указанному индексу.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="array" /> parameter is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: Параметр <paramref name="array" /> является многомерным.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - или -

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> is greater than the available space between <paramref name="arrayIndex" /> and the end of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: Количество элементов в <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> больше, чем может поместиться в свободном пространстве между индексом <paramref name="arrayIndex" /> и концом массива <paramref name="array" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="array" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Параметр <paramref name="array" /> имеет значение <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="arrayIndex" /> parameter is less than the <paramref name="array" /> parameter's lower bound.
trans-unit.target: Параметр <paramref name="arrayIndex" /> меньше, чем нижняя граница параметра <paramref name="array" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает перечислитель, выполняющий итерацию по коллекции <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator of the subelements of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> you can use to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Перечислитель подэлементов <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> можно использовать для прохода по коллекции.

trans-unit.source: Builds a hash value based on all values contained in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Строит хэш-значение на основе всех значений в текущей коллекции <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: A hash value based on all values contained in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Хэш-значение на основе всех значений в текущей коллекции <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> to locate.
trans-unit.target: Искомый объект <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает индекс указанного объекта <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> в текущей <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> specified by the <paramref name="value" /> parameter in the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: Индекс <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />, указанного параметром <paramref name="value" /> в <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />, если он найден; в противном случае — значение -1.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index where <c>value</c> should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: Отсчитываемый от нуля индекс, по которому следует вставить <c>value</c>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> to insert.
trans-unit.target: Вставляемый объект <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> into the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Вставляет <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> в текущую коллекцию <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> по указанному индексу.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the entry to locate in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Отсчитываемый от нуля индекс записи для расположения в текущей коллекции <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the entry at the specified index of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Получает или задает запись по указанному индексу в текущей коллекции <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> at the specified index of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Объект <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> по указанному индексу в текущей коллекции <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> parameter is outside the valid range of indexes for the collection.
trans-unit.target: Параметр <paramref name="index" /> находится вне допустимого диапазона индексов для коллекции.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> to remove from the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Сертификат <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />, который требуется удалить из текущей коллекции <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes a specific <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> from the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Удаляет определенный <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> из текущей коллекции <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> specified by the <paramref name="value" /> parameter is not found in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Сертификат <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />, заданный параметром <paramref name="value" />, не найден в текущей коллекции <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
